author: iboss

commands.description: Adds domains, IPs, and/or URLs to an allow list.
commands.name: iboss-add-entity-to-allow-list

commands.description: Adds domains, IPs, and/or URLs to a block list.
commands.name: iboss-add-entity-to-block-list

commands.description: Lookup reputation data for IP addresses.
commands.name: ip

commands.description: Removes domains, IPs, and/or URLs from an allow list
commands.name: iboss-remove-entity-from-allow-list

commands.description: Removes domains, IPs, and/or URLs to a block list.
commands.name: iboss-remove-entity-from-block-list

integration.description: Manage block lists, manage allow lists, and perform domain, IP, and/or URL reputation and categorization lookups.
integration.name: iboss (Partner Contribution)

description: Manage block lists, manage allow lists, and perform domain, IP, and/or URL reputation and categorization lookups.
name: iboss
readme:
Note: This is a beta pack, which lets you implement and test pre-release software. Since the pack is beta, it might contain bugs. Updates to the pack during the beta phase might include non-backward compatible features. We appreciate your feedback on the quality and usability of the pack to help us identify issues, fix them, and continually improve.

This pack provides the iboss integration module which allows users to manage block lists, manage allow lists, and perform domain, IP, and/or URL reputation and categorization lookups.
